ohu mema sulu kandayama “ drawida nawa koti “ namin bauthisma karanawa. 1972 nawa janaraja wyasthawa elidakwimedi uthure athiwu yam yam wirodhatha drawida tharuna satankamithwiya pradarshanaya kala mul awasthawak .1975 .07.27dina yapanaye purapathi alfurd dureappa wedi thaba ghathanaya karanawa.1978.09.07 dina rathmalana guwan thotupaledi awro guwan yanaya pupurawa harinne 1978 aandu kramama wyawasthawata wirodhaya pamin.

adhyapana karyalayata idiripath wu rohalata athulath kala wita satahan thabana ada ihapathe sahathika kala pitapathe rogiya pera dawasa daha nawawana payata rohalata athulath kala bawath , pasuda perawaru dahayata rohalen muda hariya bawath.
ihatha ki ratawala ma mulinma giye 1979 di.

agramathya karyalaye prathipaththi sanwardhana karyalaya, lanka bankuwa samanga ekwa kriyathmaka kara athi thurunu diriya naya yojana kramaya me wana wita sarthaka pragathiyak penwa athi bawa pasugiyada araliyagaha mandirayedi pawathi ehi pragathi samalochana raswimedi anawaranaya wiya.
